xuiCheckbox
directive in module xui

Description

XUI Checkbox. The styling can be altered by applying a class to this element. Currently supported class is xui-checkbox-empty--no-left-padding that can be used if empty checkbox is needed with regular checkbox paddings.

Usage

as element:
<xui-checkbox
       [help-text="{string}"]
       name="{string}"
       [is-disabled="{string}"]
       [require-text="{string}"]
       value="{string}"
       [title="{string}"]
       [is-indeterminate="{boolean}"]>
</xui-checkbox>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
help-text
(optional)
string

Value displayed as a help text.

namestring

Name of the checkbox element.

is-disabled
(optional)
string

Expression to determine if the checkbox should be disabled.

require-text
(optional)
string

Expression to determine if mandatory.

valuestring

Value of the check box. Bound to the ngModel.

title
(optional)
string

Title of the check box. Is displayed as a tooltip.

is-indeterminate
(optional)
boolean

True to indicate that the state of the checkbox is indeterminate.
